remarks: Specialization of the Extreme Value Theorem to a closed interval of ` RR ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
statement:
evthicc.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
evthicc.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
evthicc.3 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
evthicc.4 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> RR ) ) $.
evthicc $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. ( A [,] B ) A. y e. ( A [,] B ) ( F ` y ) <_ ( F ` x ) /\ E. z e. ( A [,] B ) A. w e. ( A [,] B ) ( F ` z ) <_ ( F ` w ) ) ) $.
$d A w z $.
$d A x y $.
$d B w z $.
$d B x y $.
$d F w z $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph w z $.
$d ph x y $.
